events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred last night involving their vehicle and another driver at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details describing a collision with another automobile.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to assist the claimant throughout the claims process efficiently.
The claimant received formal acknowledgement confirming their report of the automobile collision and claim submission.
To proceed with the claim, the claimant has been requested to provide photos of vehicle damage and a police report.
The claimant submitted all requested documentation, including detailed accident photos and the official traffic incident report.
The insurance company began a thorough investigation of the vehicle collision to verify liabilities and extent of damages.
Investigation has concluded with confirmation that the policyholder was not at fault and damages are covered under policy terms.
A settlement offer has been made to the claimant to cover the repair costs outlined in the damage assessment.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the speed and fairness of the process.
After review of all documentation and customer feedback, the claim has been formally approved for payment processing.
The settlement payment has been issued to the claimantâ€™s designated bank account covering the vehicle repair costs.
The claim case has been officially closed, with all payments completed and the claim holder notified promptly.
The claim records have been archived securely for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
